page.title: 05Transport
page.content: In 1985 there are a lot of cars, vans and lorries about.There are 31 people in our class and they own 46 cars altogether. If you were on a motorway you would see cars, vans, lorries and motorbikes. My family has one car and four bikes. Most people in our village have got bikes and everybody in our class has too.Mrs.Cowlrick has a bike too. Cars cost about Â£5000, lorries cost about Â£15000, vans cost about Â£3000 and motorbikes cost about Â£800 and they are going up in price all the time. Most people go abroad for their holiday and to get abroad you can go by ship, aeroplane or train. You don't normally go abroad by train because you have to go across the sea. By Sally Charles, aged 11.
